name: Classic Mojito
description: Muddle mint leaves, sugar, and lime juice in a glass. Add rum and ice, then top with soda water. Stir gently and garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Espresso Martini
description: Shake all ingredients with ice until well-chilled. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with coffee beans.

name: Virgin Cucumber Cooler
description: Muddle cucumber slices with lime juice and agave syrup. Add ice, top with soda water, and stir gently. Garnish with mint leaves.

name: Virgin Pina Colada
description: Blend all ingredients with ice until smooth. Pour into a glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge or cherry.
